Description:
Notice I N / 0 80322/KJE/01 / 312364381- IN served - You have failed to appoint one or more competent persons to assist in undertaking the measures you need to take to comply with the requirements and prohibitions imposed upon you by or under the relevant statutory provisions.

Notice I N / 0 80322/KJE/02 / 312364464 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (MWF), which may result in an identifiable disease or adverse health effect (including
occupational asthma and dermatitis) used in your CNC Lathe machine (Leadwell VTL-600 L2TAH0472), is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Notice I N / 0 80322/KJE/03 / 312364475 - IN served - You have failed to provide Health Surveillance, where it is appropriate for the protection of the health of your employees who are, or are liable to be, exposed to metalworking fluid, which is a substance hazardous to health.

Notice I N / 0 80322/KJE/04 / 312364485 - IN served - You have failed to prevent access to the dangerous part of machinery, namely the cutting parts, or stop the movement of any dangerous part of machinery before any part of a person enters a danger zone of the Elliot
Concord 460 Lathe located within the machining area of your unit by not fitting guards.
